description:
test: use testlib (second 100)

X ,s;^// \$G (\$D/)?\$F\.go *$;// compile;g
X ,s;^// \$G (\$D/)?\$F\.go && \$L \$F\.\$A *$;// build;g
X ,s;^// \$G (\$D/)?\$F\.go && \$L \$F\.\$A && \./\$A\.out *$;// run;g
X ,s;^// errchk \$G( -e)? (\$D/)?\$F\.go *$;// errorcheck;g
